title: Alright Riot, another Azir thread.
body: I understand that you don't want him disabled over a minor bug, but the thing is : it's not minor. Seriously, it's frustrating when you're farming then your champ just starts moving randomly like a chicken whose head has just been chopped off ... CAN YOU PLEASE ADRESS THIS ASAP ? I really don't want to wait till patch for this to be fixed. Playing this buggy champ is already frustrating enough, can we not add this to the list too ?

replies.body:
Hey GuillotineCutter - 

This is something that won't be fixed until next patch. Sorry about the delay!
Just played my first Azir game in months and i come back to this crap. I didn't do bad, but it was super annoying. I came here to complain, but i see it's already being addressed :p
